rules: Rule1: Provided that production is scheduled at the facility, if the absence of solvent in the extraction unit implies that the reaction vessel catalyst is not active, then the intermediate compound does not require purification.
Rule2: If the fermenter temperature is high, then the API vat is not contaminated.
Rule3: Under the condition that the compound tank mixer is running, the substance batch becomes homogeneous.
Rule4: Either the compound tank mixer is running, or the reaction vessel catalyst is not active.

Rule5: Provided that the production line safety protocol is active, if the circumstance that the compound tank mixer is not running leads to the substance batch not being homogeneous, then the final product passes the quality check.
Rule6: Whenever the situation where solvent absence in the extraction unit implies catalyst inactivity occurs, the intermediate compound requires purification.
Rule7: Provided that it is not the case that power unavailability at the plant implies high fermenter temperature, the reaction vessel catalyst is active.
Rule8: Under the condition that the plant does not have power available, the API vat is contaminated.
facts: Fact1: Production is scheduled at the facility.
Fact2: The production line safety protocol is active.
Fact3: The extraction unit contains solvent.
Fact4: The final product has not passed the quality check.
